statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE style_name = 'Casual';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT style_name, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, total_amount ASC, customer_id
SELECT order_id, style_name, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 2
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) as total_spent FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) as avg_amount FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM ProductPurchases WHERE order_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ProductPurchases ORDER BY purchase_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders JOIN ProductPurchases ON CustomerOrders.order_id = ProductPurchases.order_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders JOIN ProductPurchases ON CustomerOrders.order_id = ProductPurchases.order_id WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, SUM(p.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CustomerOrders c JOIN ProductPurchases p ON c.order_id = p.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT p.product_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM ProductPurchases p GROUP BY p.product_id HAVING purchase_count > 3 ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';

SELECT orders.order_date, customers.customer_name, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.unit_price FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, products.product_category, order_items.quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, purchase_history.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_history.purchase_date ASC;
